title: Is checking for the CBSE improvement exam lenient or hard? - Quora

response.answer_text: CBSE boards are little tough when compared to state boards… We all know CBSE papers have different questions sometimes but with reference to our NCERT textbook…. They will probably have an idea that if new questions are going to be asked, mass cheating is going to occur… So overall, yes CBSE improvements boards have tough checking.
